mapper.select: SELECT a.anime_id AS animeId, a.title_kor AS title, a.cover_image_url AS coverImageUrl, ar.rank_num AS rankNum, g.genre_kor AS genreName FROM Anime AS a JOIN AnimeRanking AS ar ON a.anime_id = ar.anime_id JOIN Genres AS g ON ar.genre_id = g.genre_id WHERE ar.year = #{year} AND ar.season_int = #{season} AND DATE(ar.rank_date) = #{rankDate} ORDER BY ar.rank_num
